bitpix_refout.title: bits per data value
bitpix_refout.description: The value field shall contain an integer that specifies the number of bits that represent a data value in the associated data array. BITPIX = 0 for the primary header. For an image extension, 16 is uncalibrated and -32 is calibrated. For group information captured in an AREFOUTI table extension BITPIX = 8, denoting that the array contains AREFOUTI characters.

naxis_refout.title: Number of axes
naxis_refout.description: The value field shall contain a non-negative integer no greater than 999, representing the number of axes in the associated data array. A value of zero signifies that no data follow the header in the HDU.  In the context of FITS 'TABLE' or 'BINTABLE' extensions, the value of NAXIS is always 2.

naxis1_refout.title: Size of the axis
naxis1_refout.description: The value field of this indexed keyword shall contain a non-negative integer, representing the number of elements along axis n of a data array.  The NAXISn must be present for all values n = 1,...,NAXIS, and for no other values of n. A value of zero for any of the NAXISn signifies that no data follow the header in the HDU. If NAXIS is equal to 0, there should not be any NAXISn keywords.

naxis2_refout.title: Size of the axis
naxis2_refout.description: The value field of this indexed keyword shall contain a non-negative integer, representing the number of elements along axis n of a data array.  The NAXISn must be present for all values n = 1,...,NAXIS, and for no other values of n. A value of zero for any of the NAXISn signifies that no data follow the header in the HDU. If NAXIS is equal to 0, there should not be any NAXISn keywords.

naxis3_refout.title: Size of the axis
naxis3_refout.description: The value field of this indexed keyword shall contain a non-negative integer, representing the number of elements along axis n of a data array.  The NAXISn must be present for all values n = 1,...,NAXIS, and for no other values of n. A value of zero for any of the NAXISn signifies that no data follow the header in the HDU. If NAXIS is equal to 0, there should not be any NAXISn keywords.

naxis4_refout.title: Size of the axis
naxis4_refout.description: The value field of this indexed keyword shall contain a non-negative integer, representing the number of elements along axis n of a data array.  The NAXISn must be present for all values n = 1,...,NAXIS, and for no other values of n. A value of zero for any of the NAXISn signifies that no data follow the header in the HDU. If NAXIS is equal to 0, there should not be any NAXISn keywords.

pcount_refout.title: number of parameter bytes following data table
pcount_refout.description: The value field shall contain an integer that shall be used in any way appropriate to define the data structure. In IMAGE extensions this keyword must have the value 0.

bscale_refout.title: scale factor for array value to physical value
bscale_refout.description: scale factor for array value to physical value

bzero_refout.title: physical value for an array value of zero
bzero_refout.description: physical value for an array value of zero

extname_refout.title: extension name containing miri ref frame data
extname_refout.description: EXTNAME of the extension containing error data.
